MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.35am to repair an underground cable located outside 73 Cunningham Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.10am on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
